parameters.name: TFRS_RELEASE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag name for this release, sample value: v1.3.4

parameters.name: SCAN_COORDINATOR_IS_NAME
parameters.description: The scan coordinator image stream name, valid values: scan-handler-develop and scan-handler

source.dockerfile:
FROM python:3.6.8-slim-stretch
RUN apt-get update \
    && apt-get install -y git \
    && apt-get install -y supervisor
WORKDIR /app
RUN git clone https://github.com/bcgov/tfrs.git
WORKDIR /app/tfrs
RUN git checkout ${tfrs_release}
RUN pip install --upgrade pip \
    && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt
RUN cp /app/tfrs/security-scan/scan-handler/scan-handler.conf /etc/supervisor/conf.d
RUN chgrp -R root /var/log/supervisor
RUN chmod -R g+w /var/log/supervisor
RUN chmod -R g+w /run
RUN chmod -R g+w /app
# RUN sed -i "s/chmod=0700/chmod=0770/g" /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf
CMD ["supervisord"]
